page.title: 02OGWELL & DENBURY 2
page.content: In{East Ogwell}where we live there are lots of houses being built.We have got a{Post Office}which is also a village shop. Down in Sunny Hollow a lady called Mrs Saunders lets us in her swimming pool.At the end of the summer we will buy her a box of chocolates. Some times when it is hot we go and play tennis on the village tennis court.You only have to pay 50p if you are a member. Up on the green there is a death swing, where we go and play sometimes. It is great fun. Outside the village there is a cattery where they keep cats for people who are on holiday. The cats are looked after very well.{ } { Sarah Stonelake and Helen Cane { aged 10. {
